name: London Electrician
description: we provide tradesmen and customer a plac
overview:
We provide home owners with quality tradesmen : Plumbers, Electricians, builders, bricklayers, decorators, kitchen fitters, bathroom fitters, floor fitters, heating plumbers,…

Jobs realted to Electricians: Rewires, Extra sockets, Kitchen rewires, Lighting / switches, Cooker installations, Down lighters, Outside lighting / sockets, installing electrical Towel rails or Door entry systems Fault finding, Repairs, Consumer unit / fuse box, Immersion heaters, Tripping circuits, Fitting new lights, Faulty extractor fans, Smoke alarms, Electric showers or Transformers Periodic test & inspections, Landlord test & inspection, Home Buyers test & inspection, Portable Appliance Testing (PAT), Domestic testing or Commercial testing

Jobs relating to plumbing / plumber : • Fixing broken / leaking toilets • Repairing water leaks • Replacing broken taps • Replacing and installing new radiators • Installing new kitchens and bathroom plumbing • Fitting baths and sinks mixers and taps • Clearing blocked drains or main drains • Installing new washing machines and dishwashers • Fitting and repairing waste disposal units • Fitting water purification and filtration systems Jobs realting o heating:

Central Heating replacement, repair and installations
Radiators repair and replacement
Gas Safety Certificates for landlords
Bathrooms installation
Immersion Heaters fitting
Hot Water Cylinders fitting and change
Cold Water Storage Tanks systems installation
Waste Disposal fitting
Diverter Valves repairs
Shower Pumps and electric shower  installation
Combination boiler installation
